713784f-a.title: Manhattan: 55th Street (West) - 12th Avenue
713784f-a.text:
(1)
West 35th Street, st, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of
Twelfth Ave.
May s, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
Ehe sawe, at an earlier date.
May 20, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same as No. 1, and showing cut for new road, (Twelfth Ave).
October 3, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

710797f-a.title: Manhattan: 12th Avenue - 55th Street
710797f-a.text:
Twelfth Avenue, at the N.E. corner of W. 55th Street, showing
the 8 story Rishel Building at that locatixi. Behind same appears
the smoke stack of the Dept. of Sanitati on. This civic unit in
1937 will have a modern incinerator plant here occupying the entire
avenue frontage from 57th to 55th Streets. The photographer is
viewing north eastward across Twelfth Avenue from the river side
of same.
A negativ print accompanies this photostat reproduction.
May 29, 1931
Views 1 and 2
P. L. Sperr
1O R PRODUCTIOie

710796f-b.title: Manhattan: 12th Avenue - 55th Street
710796f-b.text:
Twelfth Avenue, north from West 55th Street. In the back-
ground is the elevated highway over the New York Central
Railroad yards. At the left are the huge North River piers
where the various trans-Atlantio steamships dock.
August 29, 1933
April 15, 1934
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

713785f-a.title: Manhattan: 55th Street (West) - 12th Avenue
713785f-a.text:
West 55th Street, at, adjoining and east of the 1.E. corner of Teelfth
Ave. Also shown is Twelfth Nve., east side, north from and including
west 55th to and including 56th Streets.
April 15, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

710795f-a.title: Manhattan: 12th Avenue - 55th Street
710795f-a.text:
Twelfth Avenue, south from West 55th Street, showing
ccnstructional detail of the widening and improvement
of this marginal thoroughfare. The West Side Vehicular
Highway is being continued thru this view. At the left
appears a portion of the new westerly frontage of Dewitt
Clinton Park. Note the retaining wall.
June 19, 1936
H. B. Hoffman, photo
New York Historical Society
MAY BE REPRODUCED

710798f-a.title: Manhattan: 12th Avenue - 55th Street
710798f-a.text:
(1)
Twelfth Ave., east side, north from, but not including West 55th
Street.
May 21, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from a different angle.
May 21, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same as No. 1, showing, under construction, the West Side
Vehicular Express Highway. The building with the chimneys is the
power house of the IInterborough Rapid Transit Co.
August 13, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
